description: Determine the number of downloads for the app 'Tuenti'.
Identify the app with the highest number of downloads.
Compute the total number of downloads for all the listed apps.
Find any app that has a significantly lower number of downloads compared to others.
Determine if there is a correlation between the mobile app name and the number of downloads.
Which apps have more than 5 million downloads?
Order the apps from the highest to the lowest number of downloads.
What is the range of the number of downloads across all mobile apps?
What percentage of the apps have more than 7 million downloads?
Identify any clusters of apps with similar download counts.
